posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 7 Piedmont Backs  SOLD
posts.post_content:
FS: Lot of 7 T206 Piedmont backs. All Raw 3 were graded Doyle Throwing PSA 2, Herzog NY PSA 2, Moran SGC 20 (assume because of backstamp). All other are in nice g-vg condition, few with backstamps (see scans). Looking for SOLD shipped w/delivery confirmation.. Perfer paypal no fee, check, money order.... Thanks in advance... Ralph
